      • hasCycles

        public boolean hasCycles(T from)
        Check if there are cycles in the resource graph starting from a given node. Implementation note: classical breadth-first algorithm.
        Parameters:
        from - Node
        Returns:
        true if there are cycles.

      • findCycle

        public List<T> findCycle(T node)
        Tries to find a cycle in the resource graph.
        Parameters:
        node - Starting node
        Returns:
        List of nodes originating from source node or empty list if no cycle found.

      • hasCycles
